comment: You can either set these values as environment variables or to a file called '.config.json' at the root of the repo
SSH_PUBLIC_KEY: ssh-rsa create an ssh public key using ssh-keygen
ciAzureClientId: Client ID to access Azure Subscription
ciAzureClidntIdSecret: Secret of Client ID to access Azure Subscription
ciResourceGroupName: Existing resource group with pre-created resources
ciStorageAccountName: Existing storage account with in the resource group
ciSpecializedWinVHDUri: Specialized Windows VHD URI. This should be in same region as of deployments.
ciGeneralizedWinVHDUri: Generalized Windows VHD URI. This should be in same region as of deployments.
ciKeyVaultResourceId: ARM resource id for key vault
ciKeyVaultSSLSecretName: Secret name for SSL certificate in key vault
ciKeyVaultSSLSecretUri: URI for SSL certificate secret in key vault
ciCustomFqdnName: Fully qualified custom domain name, properly configured with CNAME mapping
ciCustomWebAppName: First part of custom fqdn name
ciCustomDomainSSLCertPfxData: SSL certificate PFX data in base 64 encoded format
